title: Beachfront Villa Escape in Thailand
description: Experience the ultimate beachfront holiday on the tropical Thai island of Koh Samui. Spend five nights in a Garden Villa at Centara Villas Samui and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one multi-course lunch or dinner for two, one Thai lunch, daily 30-minute spa treatments each, one nightly cocktail per person, a leisurely late 4pm checkout and return airport transfers from Koh Samui Airport.
offer_address: 111 Moo 2, Maret, Natien Beach, 84310 Laem Set Beach, Thailand
